#summary Steps taken in order to setup Subclipse Eclipse Plug-in.

= Setup =

    # Open Eclipse
    # Help > Software Updates
    # Select the 'Available Software' Tab
    # Click 'Add Site'
    # Paste 'http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x/' into Location
    # Select the features available for installation
    # Accept the license agreement and click install
    # Restart Eclipse
    # Window > Open Perspective > Other
    # Select SVN Repository Exploring
    # Right-click inside the 'SVN Repositories' tab
    # New > Rpository Location
    # Put the url that you can find on the google [ code page] inside the 'Url' input box
